content: > **multibuy coupon codes** > > any 2patterns 35% off - buy2get35 > > any 3 patterns 40% off - buy3get40 > > any 4 patterns 45% off - buy4get45 > > any 5 patterns 40% off - buy5get50 wrap yourself in classic crochet style with this easy granny stitch scarf using the traditional granny stitch this pattern is simple enough for beginners while still being a fun and relaxing make for experienced crocheters the scarf works up quickly and looks beautiful in solid colours stripes or even leftover yarn from your stash a step-by-step video tutorial is included to guide you through every stitch making it a great project if you re new to crochet whether you re making a cosy accessory for yourself or a thoughtful handmade gift this granny stitch scarf is sure to become a favourite
